text:
Townsquared | San Francisco, CA | Onsite | Fulltime

I'm a software engineer at Townsquared, a social network for small businesses. We're looking for software engineers to work on our backend systems, web app, and mobile apps: https://townsquared.com/join-our-team/

If you have any questions, my email is in my GitHub profile: https://github.com/benatkin
